name: INeedaGyro
0:
”Alexa open I Need a Gyro”
”Alexa ask I Need a Gyro to find three gyros”
”Alexa launch I Need a Gyro”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i need a gyro
des: Find a place to buy a gyro close to you. For best results, pronounce 'gyro' as JAI-row (\ ˈjī-(ˌ)rō \).
